EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_Meetups.April 2015 ApacheCon - TX targeted
EmailTemplate.subject: Meetup: Open Sourced GemFire In-Memory Distributed Database and Apache Contributors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Join us on Sunday, April 12, from 6:30pm to 9:30pm, for a meetup at ApacheCon.
Sudhir Menon, Jags Ramnarayan and Dan Smith will talk about the technology behind the "GemFire" in-memory data grid, its history and how you can become a contributor to this powerful technology.
- Open Sourced GemFire In-Memory Distributed Database and Apache Contributors - Sunday, April 12, 2015 - Learn more and Register here: bit.ly/POSHApacheCon-2015 <http://bit.ly/POSHApacheCon-2015>
We're looking forward to seeing you!
